New Records: Harry Kane will become the 10th Englishman to reach a century of international caps
Pre-Game Insights: England captain Harry Kane will be presented with a gold cap to mark his 100th appearance for his country ahead of the Nations League match against Finland at Wembley on Tuesday (2:45 p.m. ET on FS2)

Others: Harry Kane will start the match against Finland, where he will be captain for the 73rd time.
Harry Kane has a record 66 goals for the team.
